message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Seems fair, right?
I want a bit more, 60-40 is still fair!
Okay, Bob, I'll give you a bit more. 55 for me, 45 for you. Let's get this done.
I'll take 58, and you can have 42. Inflation is eating away our money!
Okay, Bob. Let's compromise. I'll take 52, you take 48. This is getting ridiculous. We're losing a fortune with each round!
